728671f-c.title: Richmond: Center Street - Court Place
728671f-c.text:
Center Street, south side, at the head of Court
Flace, showing the old Eichmond County Court House and
the county jail (right).
About 1910
By Mulford Simonson
From P. L. Sperr Collection
(2)
The sawe, years later.
1923
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
Looking up Court Place toward the old County
Court House.
June 16, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS

728675f-b.title: Richmond: Center Street - Court Place
728675f-b.text:
(1)
Center Street, at the N. W. corner of Court Place (Richmond),
showing the Staten lIsland Eistorical Society Wnseom. This building
was formerly the County Clerk's and Surrogate's office and was built
in 1848. It was restored to its present condition in 1934.
August 8, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
Thhe same, another view.
August 8, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728675f-b.folder: Center Street & Court Place, Staten Island, NY

728673f-a.title: Richmond: Center Street - Court Place
728673f-a.text:
Center Street, at the N.W. corner of Court Place, showing the
old Richmond County Clerk and Surrogate's office. It was later
renovated and made the home of the Staten Island Historical Society
Museum. The plaque above the center door bears the date 1848.
April 26, 1928
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728673f-a.folder: Center Street & Court Place, Staten Island, NY

728674f-a.title: Richmond: Center Street - Court Place
728674f-a.text:
(1)
Center Street, at the N.W. corner of Court Place (Richmond),
showing the old County Clerk's and Surrogate'e office building which
was erected in 1848 and used for that purpose until 1920. It has
been restored and made the home of the Staten Island Historical
Society Museum. For additional data see 'The Sun'', October 10, 1936.
May 17, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, at a later date, during restoration work..
October 13, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The museum after completion.
August 8, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
728674f-a.folder: Center Street & Court Place, Staten Island, NY

728672f-b.title: Richmond: Center Street - Court Place
728672f-b.text:
(1)
Center Street, at the N.E. corner of Court Place (Richmond).
The maps from 1874 to 1907 indicate it to have been the J. S. Black
house.
May 17, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, at a later date. Note alterations.
May 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
